channel.title: CiTR -- French Connection
channel.description: French Connection avec Marie-Eve Dumulong pour tout savoir sur les activités culturelles Francophones de Vancouver et ses environs. Plus, de la musique 100% Francophone du Québec et d'ailleurs. With French Connection you'll discover everything about de French culture, on CITR 101.9 FM Vancouver.
channel.itunes:summary: French Connection avec Marie-Eve Dumulong pour tout savoir sur les activités culturelles Francophones de Vancouver et ses environs. Plus, de la musique 100% Francophone du Québec et d'ailleurs. With French Connection you'll discover everything about de French culture, on CITR 101.9 FM Vancouver.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Jun-2011
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, you will hear a lot of good French music to spend a good time during summer time!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer time on French Connection!

item.title: Broadcast on 02-Jun-2011
item.description: Bonjour, Listen to the edition of French Connection if you want to know the line up of Festival d'ete from June 16th to June 24th. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Festival d'ete Francophone de Vancouver coming soon!

item.title: Broadcast on 26-May-2011
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, you will hear two interviews with two French local artists from Pacifique en Chanson 2011. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Pacifique en chanson

item.title: Broadcast on 19-May-2011
item.description: Bonjour! L'ete est arrive(r)! This is a summer French edition of French Connection. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer has arrived!

item.title: Broadcast on 12-May-2011
item.description: Bonjour, In this show, you will hear an interview with the musician Mathew Pellerin Bergeron from Sqamish... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Mathew Pellerin Bergeron

item.title: Broadcast on 05-May-2011
item.description: Bonjour, In this show, you will discover a lot of new artists from Montreal. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: La releve a French Connection

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Apr-2011
item.description: Bonjour, To know more about all the French activities in B.C. visit fccabc.org and listen to French Connection... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: fccabc.org

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Apr-2011
item.description:
Bonjour!
In this show, just enjoy a lot of French music!!!
Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French music...

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Apr-2011
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show, you will hear an interview with the Francophone musician Myriam Parent. Check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Myriam Parent

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Apr-2011
item.description:
Bonjour,
In this show, I talk about the 125th anniversary of Vancouver. French Connection BC (fccabc.org) launched its Francophone lectures and conversations series at SFU/Woodward's building on April 6th... check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: 125th... The French Presence in Vancouver...!

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Mar-2011
item.description: Bonjour... Non! French Connection does not have a QR code but my two guests in this show have one and educate us about it. SO, check this out and enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: QR code...

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Mar-2011
item.description: Bonjour tout le monde, Enjoy this edition of French Connection!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Cirque!

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Mar-2011
item.description: Bonjour, In B.C., there is a lot of people who can speak French as a second language. In this show, you will hear a mini-documentary about Francophiles in B.C. as well as talking about the month of La Francophonie... in March!!! Check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Francophiles in B.C.

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Feb-2011
item.description: Bonjour, In this show, a mini-documentary about the French programs at UBC and SFU. Check this out! and enjoy the good French music!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French departments at UBC and SFU...

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Feb-2011
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, you will learn a bit more about the French social media here in Vancouver. As well, an interview with artistic director Daniel Cournoyer for the French play: La peau d'Elisa. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French social media

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Feb-2011
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, you will hear a mini-documentary about Canadians Parents for French and as well you will listen to an interview with the two organizers of the Frencophone film Festival. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Canadians Parents for French...

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Feb-2011
item.description: Bonjour everyone, In this show, you will learn a little bit more about the Francophone gay community here in Vancouver. Take a listen!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: The francophone gay community in Vancouver

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Jan-2011
item.description:
Bonjour everybody!
In this show, you will learn about Maillardville French community. Check this out!!! and also a lot of good french music!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Maillardville mini-documentary

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Jan-2011
item.description: Bonjour!!! Bonne Annee everyone!!! In this show, you will hear a mini-documentary about the french community in Victoria. It's very good, check this out!!! and my predictions for 2011... about french music... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy New Year!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Dec-2010
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, you will learn about the history of the French community in Victoria. Check this out, it's really interesting!!! Happy Holidays!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Victoria French community

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Dec-2010
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, you will hear a mini documentary about the french community in Nanaimo. Their annual Maple Sugar Festival is coming up in Febuary, check this out!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Nanaimo french community

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Dec-2010
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, you will learn about the french community in Powell River and as well an interview with the artist Antony Rolland. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Powell River mini bilingual documentary

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Nov-2010
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, an interview aiwht Craig for The Madonna Painter presents at UBC Theater and interview with Salome Eon speaking about French in Vancouver. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: The Madonna Painter...

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Oct-2010
item.description: Bonjour tout le monde, In this show, you will hear some music from C'est extra Vancouver! French Dj night. The next French Dj next is on November 27th. Don't miss it!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy Halloween...!

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Oct-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show I interview Alex Brabant from Francouver.ca. He talks about the biggest multi-cultural party for this coming Halloween on Oct.30th Join us!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Halloween fiesta!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Oct-2010
item.description: Hi all, Theatre La Seizieme is proud to present their first play of the saison, Une maison face au nord. In this show, you will hear an interview with the artistic director. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: The francophone theater in Vancouver...

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Oct-2010
item.description: Hi everyone! In this show, I talk about the VIFF 2010 with my collaborator Emmanuel St-Juste. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: VIFF 2010

item.title: Broadcast on 30-Sep-2010
item.description: Hi everyone! In this show, my collaborator Emmanuel St-Juste and I talk about the VIFF 2010. Check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: VIFF 2010

item.title: Broadcast on 23-Sep-2010
item.description: Tune in!!! Salome Eon et Dominique Armand. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Salome Eon

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Sep-2010
item.description: Hi All, In this show, you will hear an interview with Karine Guyon painter. She is doing an exhibition at the French cultural centre in Vancouver. Also, my collaborator, John Sigurd, review for us the frnch movie, Himalaya:A path to the sky. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Karine Guyon at Le Centre

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Sep-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, I'm back to CITR doing my show live after spending 3 weeks in Montreal. I had a lot of fun!!! I hope you had a great summer everyone now is back to school for some of you... By the mind time, enjoy French Connection! Just Tune in!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to school... back to the studio for me!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Aug-2010
item.description: Hi everybody, In this show, I talk about the pride parade (CITR had a float and we had a lot of fun) and I talk about the Queer film festival. Emmanuel St-Juste, our french reporter, say what to do for the rest of the summer!!! Check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Vancouver is queer...

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Jul-2010
item.description: Hi. In this show, Emmanuel review a play called: 12 nuits. A lot of good French music and stuff to do during the summer... check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: piece 12 nuits...

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Jul-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show, an interview with Lorraine Fortin, coordinator of the summer event: L'ETHEATRE and my reporter Emmanuel St-Juste review the French movie: Les Herbes Folles... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: L'ETHEATRE

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Jul-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show, you will hear an interview with the artistic director of La Seizieme theatre and with the president of the new association in Vancouver: Francais du monde. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: La Seizieme Theatre and Francais du monde...

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Jul-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, Is time to celebrate!!! This show is 100% Canadian. Enjoy it! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy Canada day!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Jun-2010
item.description:
Hi everyone,
In this show, we will hear an interview with Coeur de Pirate, Linda Lemay and the photographer Sarah Bastin. It's as well a special Quebec... so, enjoy it!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Bonne St-Jean Baptiste!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Jun-2010
item.description:
Hi everyone,
In this show, I review the first French movie presented at the French Film Festival. My reporter Emmanuel talks about the play: The Misanthrope and Melanie Dion talks about the French people who immigrate in Canada. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French Film Festival...

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Jun-2010
item.description:
Hi everyone,
In this show, I talk about a lot of different festivals that are coming up during the summer time... check this out! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Festivals coming up...

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Jun-2010
item.description: Bonjour! In this show, I received in my studio two guests Robert and Melanie. We talked about the different attractions between Vancouver and Montreal. Futhermore, Melanie talks about the French Africain community in Vancouver. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Robert et Melanie on French Connection

item.title: Broadcast on 27-May-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show I'm talking about different French activities and events that you can take part during the summer time. A lot of new French songs in this show and a taste of the music that had played during the last C'est Extra Vancouver! night. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Just Tune in!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 20-May-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show, my reporter Emmanuel St-Juste is reviewing the Play Dangerous Corner and I welcome my other reporter Melanie Dion... and don't miss C'est Extra Vancouver! night this Saturday, May 22 at the Backstage Lounge... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Dangerous Corner review...

item.title: Broadcast on 13-May-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, The month of May is the month of music. During this month, I will be playing a lot of local French music. Check this out in this edition of French Connection!!! You will be surprise by the talent of our French artists! A bientot!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Mai de la chanson...

item.title: Broadcast on 06-May-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, Don't miss the Poutine night this Saturday at 7pm in downtown Vancouver. Alex Brabant from francouver.ca is talking about it in this edition of French Connection... check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Alex Brabant on French Connection

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Apr-2010
item.description: Hi guys! In this show I give you a taste of what is C'est Extra Vancouver, those DJ francophone nights. Plus, an interview with Melanie Dion... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: C'est extra Vancouver

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Apr-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, This Saturday I will be your MC for the next C'est Extra Vancouver night... don't miss it!!! It's at the Backstage Lounge on Granville Island, April 24th at 8:00pm, $10 at the doors... Enjoy this show with a lot of good Francophone music!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French DJ night, this Saturday, Backstage Lounge...!

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Apr-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show, I received Mario Beaudoin one of the two guys who launched the website francouver.ca If you have never heard about this website you should check this out... you will know everything about the French activities in B.C. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Francouver live at French Connection

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Apr-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show you can hear an interview with the band Wintermitts (bilingual band from Vancouver) and as well an interview with the artistic director of La Seizieme theartre for the play: Les medecins de Moliere. Enjoy it! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Wintermitts band at Le Centre Culturel...

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Mar-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, I have a guest in this show. Her name is Celine Beck. She works at Sophia Books on Hasting st. and she is reviewing some books. We also talk about French classic music. Check this out!!! and Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve and Celine
item.itunes:subtitle: chronique litteraire par Celine Beck!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Mar-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show, I introduce you to the French Centre, here, on UBC campus. There's a lot of French activities going on over there and a lot of French culture courses as wine tasting, French cooking... So, if you are interested in it, check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: UBC French Centre...

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Mar-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, If you want to practice your french this next few days, you should go see some French film showing during the French film festival, here in the Greater Vancouver. I invite you to visit their website rendez-vousvancouver.com Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French Film Festival/ Les 16e rendez-vous du cinema Quebecois et Francophone

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Feb-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, Only three more days before the end of the 2010 Winter Olympics games here in Vancouver. You can still enjoy some free French shows and activities... don't get depress... in this show I announce what you can do next after the Olympics...!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: End of the Vancouver Olympics...

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Feb-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, I hope you are enjoying the Olympics... There's a lot of activities out there... So, here in this show listen to an interview with on of my favorite band: The Lost Fingers... and listen to their version of Lady Marmelade "voulez-vous couchez avec moi ce soir..." Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with The Lost Fingers

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Feb-2010
item.description: Hi everybody, In this show you can hear an interview with the Hip Hop-electro Montreal band Radio Radio and an interview with madame Christine Sotteau, director of the French Federation in B.C. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with Radio Radio (Hip Hop band)

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Feb-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, Big, big, big show this week... you have to check this out!!! You will learn a lot about the First Francophones who came in B.C. plus, an interview with Marianne Goodwin from the Federation of Francophones of B.C. She is talking about the French language versus the Olympics... and an interview with the music group La volee des Castors (traditionnel music) Enjoy and have fun!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with La volee des Castors band from Quebec

item.title: Broadcast on 28-Jan-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, If you are from Quebec you SHOULD know the music group Mes Aieux... but if you don't listen to the interview that I did with Cedrick Giroux one of the artist from this band. They will be perform here in Vancouver and Whistler during the Olympics... don't miss them!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: interview with Mes Aieux

item.title: Broadcast on 21-Jan-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show I do an interview with Alexandre Barrette, French comedian from Quebec. He will perform on February 20th at La Place de la Francophonie on Grainville Island. Listen to this show to discover him and don't miss the French jokes!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Just For laugh... in French... in Vancouver

item.title: Broadcast on 14-Jan-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show my friend and reporter Chico from Montreal does a review about the new popular band, Misteur Valaire. Also, Chico talks about the event : Igloo Fest, a winter version of Picnik Electronic... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Misteur Valaire band...commented by Chico

item.title: Broadcast on 07-Jan-2010
item.description: Hi everyone, I hope everybody spent a great holidays with family and friends. I went to Montreal Quebec for my Holiday and I decided to talk about Quebec's winter in this show... Check this out... but don't get a cold...!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy New Year!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Dec-2009
item.description: Joyeux Noel et Bonne Annee a toutes et a tous!!! Passez un beau temps des fetes en compagnie de votre famille et amis!!! On se reparle en 2010... Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Joyeux Noel et Bonne annee!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Dec-2009
item.description: In this show, there's no big announcement, no big interview... I just had some fun to introduce some new French songs and talked about the French activities that you can take part in the next few weeks... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: nothing special...

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Dec-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show I talk about Place de la Francophonie. It's the French Quarter that will take place on Grainville Island from Feb 10 to Feb 28. If you would like to be a volunteer for the Olympics at this place... is your chance... check this out in my show!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Place de la Francophonie...

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Nov-2009
item.description: Hi everyone! Last week was the kick off of French Center 2010 season. During a wine and cheese reception professors and staff of the French Center were talking about there 2010 courses, activities and events. I did many interviews... you can check them out in this show! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French Center at UBC...

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Nov-2009
item.description: Hi everybody, Starting tomorrow night in Vancouver, Coup de Coeur Francophone 2009 present Mathieu et Ginette band, Genevieve Chasse, Marie-Pierre Arthur and Yann Perreau. For more info visit lecentreculturel.com and listen to the interview that I did with Yann Perreau... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Interview with the Quebec singer Yann Perreau...

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Oct-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, Loeffenders band needs you next week. On November 4th between 6-8pm, they are shooting their first music video at Radio-Canada (700 Hamilton St, downtown) and they needs extras!!! It's your chance to appear on TV or to play the Rock Star!!! You don't need any costumes, accessories or anything else, just show up with your friends at Radio-Canada at 5:30pm and you will have a lot of fun!!! See you there!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Have you ever dream to grace de silver screen...

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Oct-2009
item.description: Hi everyone! In this show, you will hear the new album of "We are Wolves", a new French artist that I have just discovered Benjamin Biolay and a lot of other good French songs... A lot of French activities are going on right now in Vancouver... so check this out and listen to French Connection!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: C'est extra Vancouver!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Oct-2009
item.description: Hi guys, In this show, I had the pleasure to receive my friend Emmanuel St-Juste who use to be a movie reporter at Radio-Canada. Listen to his comments about some movies that took part in the 2009 VIFF Festival. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Review of the VIFF with Emmanuel Saint-Juste

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Oct-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show, I interviewed the artistic director of Theatre La Seizieme, M Graig Holzschuh... because from Oct.20 to Oct.31 they are presented a dramatic play called: Le Perimetre... and also in this show you can enjoy a lot of new french musics from Quebec...!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French Theatre, French play in Vancouver...

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Oct-2009
item.description: Hi everyone! In this show I interviewed Alan Kolh, the director of Roadsworth/Crossing the line movie. I met Alan Kolh in Montreal when he was shooting it. Now, his movie will be presented in Vancouver on Ovtober 7th at the new W2 building. Listen to this interview, he made a really great documentary!!! Enjoy!!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Roadswotrh/Crossing the line by Alan Kolh

item.title: Broadcast on 24-Sep-2009
item.description: Hi everybody, This week was really crazy for me. I did a lot of interviews, saw a lot of events and even my partner John Gudmundson did an interview for French Connection... He interviewed for us... L'honorable Minister James Moore... Check this out!!! Marie-Eve and John
item.itunes:subtitle: Jamatonics + modern show + Olympics 2010... James Moore...

item.title: Broadcast on 17-Sep-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show, I announce all the French activities that you can take part here in Vancouver for the end of September and the begenning of October... and I received this week a press release from the Francophone B.C. Federation about where the French situation is regardling to the upcoming Olympic! Enjoy this show!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Olympic... Bilingual?!

item.title: Broadcast on 10-Sep-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, All the students are Back to school this week!!! For this occasion, CITR radio station are doing an Open House and I interviewed in this show some students from UBC who came to visit our great station... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Back to school...!

item.title: Broadcast on 03-Sep-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, Here, in this show a glimpse of the 90's music in Quebec and in France. A lot of the actual bands started their music career in this decade, so it's was hard for me to chose which music I would play. I hope you will like my medley... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: 90's special...

item.title: Broadcast on 27-Aug-2009
item.description: Hi everyone! After the 60's, the 70's... here the 80's. More disco, more pop music. A lot of those singers still release some albums nowadays. I'm sure you know a lot of them!!!! Enjoy! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: The 80's view from a Francophone perspective...

item.title: Broadcast on 20-Aug-2009
item.description: Hi baby-boomers and all the others who love the seventies... In this show you'll find out all the singers who started and got famous during the seventies. They were a lot, so I choose my favorites and the ones who represented "the best"... SEX, DRUGS AND ROCK"N"ROLL........................!!!!!!!!!! Enjoy!!! your host: Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French Pop from the seventies!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 13-Aug-2009
item.description: Hi all, This is a special show about all the most popular singers and bands from the ye-ye period, back in the 60's, in Quebec. For you, chers quebecois, you will recognized all the songs. They are all classic and memorable!!! Enjoy it and smile!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: music from the 60's in Quebec!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 06-Aug-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, I have the pleasure to announce you that French Connection is now also playing on CHLY 101.7 FM, Nanaimo. In this show you can listen to an interview with Catherine originally from Qc, but now living in Nanaimo and working at Malaspina radio station... and yes, we talked about the Nanaimo bar... Check this out!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French Connection also on CHLY 101.7 FM, Nanaimo

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Aug-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, For the annual swap show week, Marie-Eve and her co-host John (the East coast and the West coast)had fun!!! Check out to this mix of French and English hip hop music... Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve and John
item.itunes:subtitle: The two solitudes at Beats from the basement....

item.title: Broadcast on 16-Jul-2009
item.description: Hi guys, Here, in this show you'll find and interview with Mark Berube. His band will perform next week (july 17th) during the Vancouver folk music festival. Also, I interviewed Chrystelle Maechler, a French jazz singer from Montreal. Enjoy! And don't forget to join French Connection group on Facebook... you will find out everything about the French culture in B.C. Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Mark Berube and the patriotic few and Chrystelle Maechler

item.title: Broadcast on 09-Jul-2009
item.description: Hi guys! In this show you will discover a new FRENCH local band, hey oui, french band from Vancouver... it does exist!!! Leoffenders is two musicians girls very talented. They do rock-pop music with attitude... Check this out... you'll be surprise...!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Leoffenders "live" on French Connection

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 02-Jul-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, I hope you are enjoying your summer so far...! In this show I give you some ideas of some French activities or events that are taking part this summer! Enjoy! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy after St-Jean-Baptiste and Canada day!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Jun-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, French Connection is on vacation for three weeks (until june 29th). So, this show is the last show of the first semester of French Connection. In this show you can listen to all the best interviews that I did with some Montreal artists (Coeur de Pirate, Caracol and the band Karkwa)... Enjoy and have fun during the summer time!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer time!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Jun-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, French Connection is on vacation for three weeks (until june 29th). So, this show is the last show of the first semester of French Connection. In this show you can listen to all the best interviews that I did with some Montreal artists (Coeur de Pirate, Caracol and the band Karkwa)... Enjoy and have fun during the summer time!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer time!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Jun-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, French Connection is on vacation for three weeks (until june 29th). So, this show is the last show of the first semester of French Connection. In this show you can listen to all the best interviews that I did with some Montreal artists (Coeur de Pirate, Caracol and the band Karkwa)... Enjoy and have fun during the summer time!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer time!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 04-Jun-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, French Connection is on vacation for three weeks (until june 29th). So, this show is the last show of the first semester of French Connection. In this show you can listen to all the best interviews that I did with some Montreal artists (Coeur de Pirate, Caracol and the band Karkwa)... Enjoy and have fun during the summer time!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Summer time!!!

item.title: Broadcast on 28-May-2009
item.description: Hi guys! I did a really interesting interview with the band Karkwa in this show... just check this out... they will perform in Vancouver on June 20th during the Summer French Festival. Malajube and Pierre Lapointe, two other big names from Quebec, will perform as well on June 20th. To reserve your tickets call at 604-736-9806. Have fun!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Karkwa band from Montreal on French Connection...

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 21-May-2009
item.description:
Hi everyone, This show is very interesting!!! I interviewed my friend Maura Smith originally from Ontario, visited Vancouver many times and now, she has been living in MTL for about 4 years. I asked her opinion about Francophones and province of Quebec... check this out, you will enjoy it!!!
Marie-Eve and Maura
item.itunes:subtitle: Qc from an anglophone perspective...!!!

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 14-May-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, Starting tonight at the Arts Club, Les Miserables, on of the most successful musicals in history. Written by Victor Hugo and based on one of his novel. If you have never seen it, it's time!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Les Miserables...

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 07-May-2009
item.description:
Hi guys!
I hope you are doing well. In this show you will hear my review about Les points tournants (a road movie without any intermission...). This play was presented in Qc and right now they are doing a tour across Canada... Here, they are... in VANCOUVER...!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Les points tournants... French play made in Quebec!!!

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 30-Apr-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, I'm just back from Vegas... I didn't win any money, but I went to see a Cirque du Soleil show... I did a review about it... Check this out!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Vegas... Cirque du Soleil...!!!

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 23-Apr-2009
item.description: Hi guys! Here Marie-Eve with my co-Host of the day: Marie-Pierre... In this show we discussed about Marie-Pierre's personnal experience as a new Vancouverite! Also, I received Michelle Richard, one of the participant of the Pacifique en Chanson contest and not our DIVA from Quebec...! Enjoy this show!!! Marie-Eve and Marie-Pierre...!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: B.C. from a French Canadian perspective...!!!

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 16-Apr-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, Once month, there's 6@8 (happy hours) Francophone organized by B.C. Francophone youth Council and also this council needs some volunteers for the Francophone games (May 15th - May 18th. So, you can check this out on cjfcb.com and... enjoy the show!!! Marie-Eve and Kim
item.itunes:subtitle: 6@8 Franco... join us!!!

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 09-Apr-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, In this show you can hear an interview with two French artists singers from B.C. Saint-Pierre and Jamatonics group... Check those out!!! There are very talented artists!!! See you, Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Saint-Pierre, French artist singer at French Connection!!!

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 02-Apr-2009
item.description: Hi everyone, My friend Sam and I we talked about the 2009 Junos in this French Connection show. Sam covered all the English part and I did an interview with Caracol. Plus, you can hear an interview with one of the participants of Pacifique en Chanson contest. Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve and Sam
item.itunes:subtitle: Junos summary...

item.title: Broadcast on Thu 26-Mar-2009
item.description:
Hi everyone, Do you remember the horrible tragedy happened in Quebec in 1989, 14 woman were killed... They made a movie about it in Qc and since last week you can see it in Vancouver. I think I don't have to specify that is a really sad movie...
See you next week, I will talk about the Junos with my guest Sam Groenveld from Canmore, Alberta!!!
Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Polytechnique movie in Vancouver...

item.title: Broadcast on Thu-Mar-2009
item.description: If you have missed this show... you should listen to my podcast because I did an interview with Coeur de Pirate... She has been nominated for the French album of the year at the next Junos award...!!! Enjoy!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Coeur de Pirate

item.title: Broadcast on thu 12-mar-2009
item.description: Hey guys, I received in my studio the young Ian Siggurd to talk about French in B-C... as you know is the rendez-vous of the Francohponie these days... so enjoy it!!! Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Ian Siggurd Gudmundson

item.title: Broadcast on march 5th 2009
item.description:
Hi all,
Festival du bois in Maillardville is coming up this week-end. For some of you who want to discover a little bit more about the french Culture, it's a good opportunity. During this festival, many activities for children and adults, traditional music bands... but the most important thing for you dear B-C anglophones residents is you can taste our traditional POUTINE and TOURTIERE from Qc... even more on the site of Festival du Bois there is a SUGAR SHACK!!! Doesn't it sound Fabulous!!!
Bon Festival!!!
Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: festival du bois this week-end march 7th and 8th...

item.title: Broadcast on 26-feb-2009
item.description:
Here some webs site and infos about all the events that I'm talking in this show: Lentement la beaute: seizieme.ca rendez-vous de la Francophonie: rvf.ca jarimba: myspace.com/jarimba Festival du bois: festivaldubois.ca Rendez-vous du cinema: rendez-vousvancouver.com
Enjoy
Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: Lentement la beaute, entrevue avec le metteur en scene...

item.title: Broadcast on 12-Feb-2009
item.description:
Hi everyone, In this show you can listen to three interviews with comedians from Just For Laugh; Martin Petit, Charly Pop at Julie Caron.
Next week, my show will be pre-recorded, because i'm going to Whistler snowboarding. Don't miss it because my good friend Chico from Montreal will talk about Malajube, Au pied de cochon (nice resto in Mtl) and Polytechnique movie!!!
Have fun guys!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Just For Laugh in Vancouver

item.title: Broadcast on 05-Feb-2009
item.description:
From febuary 4th to march 6th is the 15th annual Quebecois and Francophone movie festival. It's a good opportunity for english speakers who wants to improve their french and discover a little bit more about the French culture...
I gave tickets on the air and I will give you more next time...
see ya
Marie-Eve
item.itunes:subtitle: French Connection #2

item.title: Broadcast on 29-jan-2009
item.description: Hey, Here Marie-Eve Thanks for listening to me today! It was my first French Connection show!!! Pay attention to Grand-Corps-Malade, one of my favorite French "slammeur"!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: My first French Connection show!!!
